name: Outlaw Outrun
description:
Constant driving through the wasteland has severly damaged your car! Luckly, there's a repair shor nearby, but that mechanic doesn't seem to know what he's doing (Maybe before the war he was an artist or a programmer).

Drive with increasingly awkward controls as you progress through the levels. Try not to lose control and run into stuff, your car isn't very sturdy!

MADE BY

Art: Sherman & Lean

Code: Luquio

Music & SFX: Franco
